meaning: We fight evil by working on it together.

text: Ebe onye dara ka chi ya kwaturu ya.
meaning: He who doesn’t know where the rain began cannot know where it will end.

text: Nwata bulie aka, o bulie aka nne ya.
meaning: When a child raises their hand, they also raise their mother’s hand.

text: Ihe onye metara, ya jiri ya buru.
meaning: Whatever one brings upon themselves, let them carry it.

text: Mmadu anaghi aka ekpe kpuo aka nri.
meaning: One cannot scratch the left hand with the right and call it a great feat.
